snippet.title: Light Watch
snippet.description: Light Watch Action game. As the keeper of the light house you must collect starpower to keep it burning.

snippet.title: Qlight
snippet.description: Qlight Jump on the platforms to light them up. Light up all the platforms to complete the level.

snippet.title: Flightless
snippet.description: Flightless Platform puzzle. Find and get as many gems as possible by exploring the caves ahead.

snippet.title: Wonderlight
snippet.description: Wonderlight Guide your light through the vacuum of space.

snippet.title: Turtle Flight
snippet.description: Turtle Flight Help the turtle in reaching the spaceship through various obstacles.

snippet.title: Submachine 2: The Lighthouse
snippet.description: Submachine 2: The Lighthouse Submachine 2 is the sequel to the original point-and-click adventure.

snippet.title: Flight of the Hamsters
snippet.description: Flight of the Hamsters How far can you make a hamster fly? Try to pick up the items to go extra far.

snippet.title: Light Bot
snippet.description: Light Bot Try to program the light-Bot in a way it will light up all the blue tiles in the factory.

snippet.title: Family Flights
snippet.description: Family Flights You are playing the Farraway Flights flight attendant Shirley. Try to keep all the passengers happy.

snippet.title: Starlight
snippet.description: Starlight Rotate the stars with the mouse and try to find the hidden picture before you run out of time.
